original_text: He put a robe on each of Aaron's sons. He tied cloth belts around them and cloth hats on their heads. The Lord had commanded Moses to do this.
korean_text: 모세가 또 아론의 아들들을 데려다가 그들에게 속옷을 입히고 띠를 띠우며 관을 씌웠으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 것과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: He put a robe on each of Aaron's sons.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아론의 아들들 각자에게 예복을 입혔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He tied cloth belts around them
and cloth hats on their heads.
